name: Alpha War (Yassin NoName)
description:
A 2D top down shooter game.

- 4 DIFFERENT MODES.

- SHOP For customizing colors and buying new ships.

- Different enemy types and bosses

- Quick Match: From 3 to 15 waves and get bonus coins after finishing.

- Endless Waves: Fight endless waves of enemies that get harder and a boss each 5 waves

- Levels Mode: Each levels from 1 to 15 waves with every 10 levels having a boss in the end of the level.

- Bosses mode: Basically a training area for bosses where you get a random boss (slightly spawn more hard or normal than easy bosses).

 

Windows, Mac & Linux

- Keyboard and mouse only, Gamepads are NOT SUPPORTED.

- Linux and Mac are NOT TESTED. (if you encounter a problem let me know)
